topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d345cb636872175ae90100#post_53d345cb636872175ae90100
Whoa; hivemind.


But in all seriousness different philosophies have different areas they excel at and other areas they fail at; same with politics and economics.  The best system is a hybrid of different beliefs that complement each other's weaknesses.  Often times the countries that fall apart are the ones that zealot believe in only one system of doing things.  That's why a pure 100% capitalist/communist/socialist nation is impossible because the nations that try to do this have to either change how they do things and stop being a pure economic theory nation or fall apart after a couple months.

Introducing Confucianism to western countries would be good in much the same way introducing Socrates to eastern countries would be good as well.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d346ee63687218383c0000#post_53d346ee63687218383c0000

Socrates held that all the cardinal virtues (wisdom, moderation, justice, courage, and piety) are on the deepest level one. Each of these is understood in terms of a psychic condition participating in the Good: the soul’s participation in the Good with respect to knowledge, wisdom; with respect to the gods, piety; with respect to what is to be dared and dreaded, courage; and with respect both to oneself and one’s position in relation to others. 

Confucius’ ethical system, by comparison, was more concrete in providing a multitude of detailed guidelines for behavior and speech, namely, to love people.

Or the TL;DR Version and EVERYONE has repeated until they drop: DON'T BE A JERKASS!

topics.body:
Now this is interesting.
!http://platinumgames.files.wordpress.com/2009/10/luka_front.jpg?w=500!
Anyone who's played Bayonetta will recognize this fabulous mother fucker. This is Luka. His full name is Luka *REDGRAVE*. I point this out because, in the official Devil May Cry prequel novels, before Dante knew he was half demon he went by the name Tony *REDGRAVE*. Now on top of these facts, Luka's father is canonically name *ANTONIO REDGRAVE*.
